Literature.Title: Metal self-assembly mimosine peptides with enhanced antimicrobial activity: towards a new generation of multitasking chelating agents.
Literature.Author: Lachowicz JI, Dalla Torre G, Cappai R, Randaccio E, Nurchi VM, Bachor R, Szewczuk Z, Jaremko L, Jaremko M, Pisano MB, Cosentino S, Orrù G, Ibba A, Mujika J, Lopez X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3390µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>3390µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>3390µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MBC=>3390µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>3390µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>3390µg/ml),Microsporum canis 10D(no activity data),Trichophyton rubrum 11D(no activity data)
